00036 // This forward declaration is required for the friend declaration
00037 // in iterator_core_access
00038 template<typename I, typename P, typename V, typename CT, typename R, typename D> class iterator_facade;
00039 
00040 class iterator_core_access
00041 {
00042     // declare our friends
00043     template<typename I, typename P, typename V, typename CT, typename R, typename D> friend class iterator_facade;
00044 
00045     // iterator comparisons are our friends
00046     template <class Dr1, class P1, class V1, class TC1, class R1, class D1,
00047               class Dr2, class P2, class V2, class TC2, class R2, class D2>
00048     friend bool
00049     operator ==(iterator_facade<Dr1,P1,V1,TC1,R1,D1> const& lhs,
00050                 iterator_facade<Dr2,P2,V2,TC2,R2,D2> const& rhs);
00051 
00052     template <class Dr1, class P1, class V1, class TC1, class R1, class D1,
00053               class Dr2, class P2, class V2, class TC2, class R2, class D2>
00054     friend bool
00055     operator !=(iterator_facade<Dr1,P1,V1,TC1,R1,D1> const& lhs,
00056                 iterator_facade<Dr2,P2,V2,TC2,R2,D2> const& rhs);
00057 
00058     template <class Dr1, class P1, class V1, class TC1, class R1, class D1,
00059               class Dr2, class P2, class V2, class TC2, class R2, class D2>
00060     friend bool
00061     operator <(iterator_facade<Dr1,P1,V1,TC1,R1,D1> const& lhs,
00062                iterator_facade<Dr2,P2,V2,TC2,R2,D2> const& rhs);
00063 
00064     template <class Dr1, class P1, class V1, class TC1, class R1, class D1,
00065               class Dr2, class P2, class V2, class TC2, class R2, class D2>
00066     friend bool
00067     operator >(iterator_facade<Dr1,P1,V1,TC1,R1,D1> const& lhs,
00068                iterator_facade<Dr2,P2,V2,TC2,R2,D2> const& rhs);
00069 
00070     template <class Dr1, class P1, class V1, class TC1, class R1, class D1,
00071               class Dr2, class P2, class V2, class TC2, class R2, class D2>
00072     friend bool
00073     operator <=(iterator_facade<Dr1,P1,V1,TC1,R1,D1> const& lhs,
00074                 iterator_facade<Dr2,P2,V2,TC2,R2,D2> const& rhs);
00075 
00076     template <class Dr1, class P1, class V1, class TC1, class R1, class D1,
00077               class Dr2, class P2, class V2, class TC2, class R2, class D2>
00078     friend bool
00079     operator >=(iterator_facade<Dr1,P1,V1,TC1,R1,D1> const& lhs,
00080                 iterator_facade<Dr2,P2,V2,TC2,R2,D2> const& rhs);
00081 
00082     // iterator difference is our friend
00083     template <class Dr1, class P1, class V1, class TC1, class R1, class D1,
00084               class Dr2, class P2, class V2, class TC2, class R2, class D2>
00085     friend typename iterator_facade<Dr1,P1,V1,TC1,R1,D1>::difference_type
00086     operator-(iterator_facade<Dr1,P1,V1,TC1,R1,D1> const& lhs,
00087               iterator_facade<Dr2,P2,V2,TC2,R2,D2> const& rhs);
00088 
00089     template<typename Facade>
00090     __host__ __device__
00091     static typename Facade::reference dereference(Facade const& f)
00092     {
00093       return f.dereference();
00094     }
00095 
00096     template<typename Facade>
00097     __host__ __device__
00098     static void increment(Facade& f)
00099     {
00100       f.increment();
00101     }
00102 
00103     template<typename Facade>
00104     __host__ __device__
00105     static void decrement(Facade& f)
00106     {
00107       f.decrement();
00108     }
00109 
00110     template <class Facade1, class Facade2>
00111     __host__ __device__
00112     static bool equal(Facade1 const& f1, Facade2 const& f2)
00113     {
00114       return f1.equal(f2);
00115     }

00121     //{

00132     template <class Facade>
00133     __host__ __device__
00134     static void advance(Facade& f, typename Facade::difference_type n)
00135     {
00136       f.advance(n);
00137     }

00145     //}

00147     //template <class Facade1, class Facade2>
00148     //__host__ __device__
00149     //static typename Facade2::difference_type distance_from(Facade1 const& f1, Facade2 const& f2, mpl::false_)
00150     //{
00151     //  return f2.distance_to(f1);
00152     //}
00153     
00154     template <class Facade1, class Facade2>
00155     __host__ __device__
00156     static typename Facade2::difference_type distance_from(Facade1 const& f1, Facade2 const& f2)
00157     {
00158       return f2.distance_to(f1);
00159     }
00160 
00161     //
00162     // Curiously Recurring Template interface.
00163     //
00164     template <class I, class P, class V, class TC, class R, class D>
00165     __host__ __device__
00166     static I& derived(iterator_facade<I,P,V,TC,R,D>& facade)
00167     {
00168       return *static_cast<I*>(&facade);
00169     }
00170 
00171     template <class I, class P, class V, class TC, class R, class D>
00172     __host__ __device__
00173     static I const& derived(iterator_facade<I,P,V,TC,R,D> const& facade)
00174     {
00175       return *static_cast<I const*>(&facade);
00176     }
00177 
00178   private:
00180     //__host__ __device__
00181     //iterator_core_access(); //undefined
00182 }; // end iterator_core_access
00183 
00184 template<typename Derived,
00185          typename Pointer,
00186          typename Value,
00187          typename CategoryOrTraversal,
00188          typename Reference,
00189          typename Difference>
00190   class iterator_facade
00191 {
00192   private:
00193     //
00194     // Curiously Recurring Template interface.
00195     //
00196     Derived& derived()
00197     {
00198       return *static_cast<Derived*>(this);
00199     }
00200 
00201     Derived const& derived() const
00202     {
00203       return *static_cast<Derived const*>(this);
00204     }
00205 
00206   public:
00207     typedef typename thrust::detail::remove_const<Value>::type value_type;
00208     typedef Reference                                          reference;
00209     typedef Pointer                                            pointer;
00210     typedef Difference                                         difference_type;
00211 
00212     // XXX investigate whether or not we need to go to the lengths
00213     //     boost does to determine this type
00214     typedef CategoryOrTraversal                                iterator_category;
00215 
00216     __host__ __device__
00217     reference operator*() const
00218     {
00219       return iterator_core_access::dereference(this->derived());
00220     }
00221 
00222     // XXX investigate whether or not we need to go to the lengths
00223     //     boost does to determine the return type
00224     __host__ __device__
00225     pointer operator->() const
00226     {
00227       return this->derived();
00228     }
00229 
00230     // XXX investigate whether or not we need to go to the lengths
00231     //     boost does to determine the return type
00232     __host__ __device__
00233     reference operator[](difference_type n) const
00234     {
00235       return *(this->derived() + n);
00236     }
00237 
00238     __host__ __device__
00239     Derived& operator++()
00240     {
00241       iterator_core_access::increment(this->derived());
00242       return this->derived();
00243     }
00244 
00245     __host__ __device__
00246     Derived  operator++(int)
00247     {
00248       Derived tmp(this->derived());
00249       ++*this;
00250       return tmp;
00251     }
00252 
00253     __host__ __device__
00254     Derived& operator--()
00255     {
00256       iterator_core_access::decrement(this->derived());
00257       return this->derived();
00258     }
00259 
00260     __host__ __device__
00261     Derived  operator--(int)
00262     {
00263       Derived tmp(this->derived());
00264       --*this;
00265       return tmp;
00266     }
00267 
00268     __host__ __device__
00269     Derived& operator+=(difference_type n)
00270     {
00271       iterator_core_access::advance(this->derived(), n);
00272       return this->derived();
00273     }
00274 
00275     __host__ __device__
00276     Derived& operator-=(difference_type n)
00277     {
00278       iterator_core_access::advance(this->derived(), -n);
00279       return this->derived();
00280     }
00281 
00282     __host__ __device__
00283     Derived  operator-(difference_type n) const
00284     {
00285       Derived result(this->derived());
00286       return result -= n;
00287     }
00288 
00289   protected:
00290     typedef iterator_facade iterator_facade_;
00291 
00292 }; // end iterator_facade

00294 // Comparison operators
00295 template <class Dr1, class P1, class V1, class TC1, class R1, class D1,
00296           class Dr2, class P2, class V2, class TC2, class R2, class D2>
00297 inline __host__ __device__
00298 // XXX it might be nice to implement this at some point
00299 //typename enable_if_interoperable<Dr1,Dr2,bool>::type // exposition
00300 bool
00301 operator ==(iterator_facade<Dr1,P1,V1,TC1,R1,D1> const& lhs,
00302             iterator_facade<Dr2,P2,V2,TC2,R2,D2> const& rhs)
00303 {
00304   return iterator_core_access
00305     ::equal(*static_cast<Dr1 const*>(&lhs),
00306             *static_cast<Dr2 const*>(&rhs));
00307 }
00308 
00309 template <class Dr1, class P1, class V1, class TC1, class R1, class D1,
00310           class Dr2, class P2, class V2, class TC2, class R2, class D2>
00311 inline __host__ __device__
00312 // XXX it might be nice to implement this at some point
00313 //typename enable_if_interoperable<Dr1,Dr2,bool>::type // exposition
00314 bool
00315 operator !=(iterator_facade<Dr1,P1,V1,TC1,R1,D1> const& lhs,
00316             iterator_facade<Dr2,P2,V2,TC2,R2,D2> const& rhs)
00317 {
00318   return !iterator_core_access
00319     ::equal(*static_cast<Dr1 const*>(&lhs),
00320             *static_cast<Dr2 const*>(&rhs));
00321 }
00322 
00323 template <class Dr1, class P1, class V1, class TC1, class R1, class D1,
00324           class Dr2, class P2, class V2, class TC2, class R2, class D2>
00325 inline __host__ __device__
00326 // XXX it might be nice to implement this at some point
00327 //typename enable_if_interoperable<Dr1,Dr2,bool>::type // exposition
00328 bool
00329 operator <(iterator_facade<Dr1,P1,V1,TC1,R1,D1> const& lhs,
00330            iterator_facade<Dr2,P2,V2,TC2,R2,D2> const& rhs)
00331 {
00332   return 0 > iterator_core_access
00333     ::distance_from(*static_cast<Dr1 const*>(&lhs),
00334                     *static_cast<Dr2 const*>(&rhs));
00335 }
00336 
00337 template <class Dr1, class P1, class V1, class TC1, class R1, class D1,
00338           class Dr2, class P2, class V2, class TC2, class R2, class D2>
00339 inline __host__ __device__
00340 // XXX it might be nice to implement this at some point
00341 //typename enable_if_interoperable<Dr1,Dr2,bool>::type // exposition
00342 bool
00343 operator >(iterator_facade<Dr1,P1,V1,TC1,R1,D1> const& lhs,
00344            iterator_facade<Dr2,P2,V2,TC2,R2,D2> const& rhs)
00345 {
00346   return 0 < iterator_core_access
00347     ::distance_from(*static_cast<Dr1 const*>(&lhs),
00348                     *static_cast<Dr2 const*>(&rhs));
00349 }

00352           class Dr2, class P2, class V2, class TC2, class R2, class D2>
00353 inline __host__ __device__
00354 // XXX it might be nice to implement this at some point
00355 //typename enable_if_interoperable<Dr1,Dr2,bool>::type // exposition
00356 bool
00357 operator <=(iterator_facade<Dr1,P1,V1,TC1,R1,D1> const& lhs,
00358             iterator_facade<Dr2,P2,V2,TC2,R2,D2> const& rhs)
00359 {
00360   return 0 >= iterator_core_access
00361     ::distance_from(*static_cast<Dr1 const*>(&lhs),
00362                     *static_cast<Dr2 const*>(&rhs));
00363 }

00365 template <class Dr1, class P1, class V1, class TC1, class R1, class D1,
00366           class Dr2, class P2, class V2, class TC2, class R2, class D2>
00367 inline __host__ __device__
00368 // XXX it might be nice to implement this at some point
00369 //typename enable_if_interoperable<Dr1,Dr2,bool>::type // exposition
00370 bool
00371 operator >=(iterator_facade<Dr1,P1,V1,TC1,R1,D1> const& lhs,
00372             iterator_facade<Dr2,P2,V2,TC2,R2,D2> const& rhs)
00373 {
00374   return 0 <= iterator_core_access
00375     ::distance_from(*static_cast<Dr1 const*>(&lhs),
00376                     *static_cast<Dr2 const*>(&rhs));
00377 }

00379 // Iterator difference
00380 template <class Dr1, class P1, class V1, class TC1, class R1, class D1,
00381           class Dr2, class P2, class V2, class TC2, class R2, class D2>
00382 inline __host__ __device__
00383 // XXX investigate whether we need to do extra work to determine the return type
00384 //     as Boost does
00385 typename  iterator_facade<Dr1,P1,V1,TC1,R1,D1>::difference_type
00386 operator-(iterator_facade<Dr1,P1,V1,TC1,R1,D1> const& lhs,
00387           iterator_facade<Dr2,P2,V2,TC2,R2,D2> const& rhs)
00388 {
00389   return iterator_core_access
00390     ::distance_from(*static_cast<Dr1 const*>(&lhs),
00391                     *static_cast<Dr2 const*>(&rhs));
00392 }

00394 // Iterator addition
00395 template <class Derived, class P, class V, class TC, class R, class D>
00396 inline __host__ __device__
00397 Derived operator+ (iterator_facade<Derived,P,V,TC,R,D> const& i,
00398                    typename Derived::difference_type n)
00399 {
00400   Derived tmp(static_cast<Derived const&>(i));
00401   return tmp += n;
00402 }
00403 
00404 template <class Derived, class P, class V, class TC, class R, class D>
00405 inline __host__ __device__
00406 Derived operator+ (typename Derived::difference_type n,
00407                    iterator_facade<Derived,P,V,TC,R,D> const& i)
00408 {
00409   Derived tmp(static_cast<Derived const&>(i));
00410   return tmp += n;
00411 }
